OOC: We are not ending the RPG.  We will continue to play and thrive, even 
with Zardus out of the picture.  I think we can and should keep it going.  
Zardus wouldn't like it that we give up just because he isn't here.

--part1_14e.2b9ba32.2901edea_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

--part1_14e.2b9ba32.2901edea_boundary--
